thread.section_title: Flatmates.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flatmates.com.au | flatmates.com.au
thread.title: Erin

author: Erin
title: Erin
text: It took a few weeks of looking and calling people, but we found the perfect match. Flatmates is easy to use and with the search options you don't have to waste time sorting through places that do not meet your criteria. One thing to beware of is that there are services like Padrooms that post on Flatmates and with those you cannot talk to the current housemates. It would be great if there was a search option to find only those units with existing housemates.
